lead_paragraph: Driven to the brink of a crushing World Series defeat on Saturday, the Chicago Cubs pledged to mount a backs-to-the-wall rally in Game Five to keep their slim hopes alive.

headline.print_headline: Cubs Cling to Slim Hopes of World Series Salvation
headline.main: Cubs Cling to Slim Hopes of World Series Salvation

snippet: Driven to the brink of a crushing World Series defeat on Saturday, the Chicago Cubs pledged to mount a backs-to-the-wall rally in Game Five to keep their slim hopes alive....
